title: Dau's Theorem Proving Example
description: Complex nested quantifier structure demonstrating theorem proving capabilities in EG
natural_language: For all x, if P(x) then there exists y such that Q(x,y) and for all z, if R(y,z) then S(z)
test_rationale: Tests deep nesting, mixed quantifiers, and complex implication chains for theorem proving
provenance_notes: Derived from Frithjof Dau Mathematical Logic with Diagrams
